column2:
"A Dark Falz that creates copies of opponents it has eaten...
Dark Falz [Double]."
"The last of them also seems to be the most troublesome one."

"They have already consumed both [Apprentice]'s and [Loser]'s Power.
It's probable that they've already
obtained [Elder]'s power as well."
"Will they... appear again in Harkotan?"

"Since they're treating it as a playground,
most likely. We should put an end to them there, if possible."

"But first, we must consult Harkotan's Miko about this.
Can both of you sortie right away?"

"Alright, leave it to us!
My physical examination's over and I feel great!
Right now, I feel like I can do anything!"

"<%me> too,
How's your body?"

"Ah, if you're alright that's fine.
I'm just a little worried."
"Looking at you fighting constantly on the front lines, reminded me a little of \"her\", 10 years ago."
"Please, don't overdo it."
"Planet \"Harkotan\", where white and black coexist. Its culture is pretty different from all the planets we've encountered till now."
"The Ashen Child, Sukunahime, was born, as a result of the lasting conflict between the Shironians and Kuronians. Also, the demon, Magatsu as well, huh?"
"It seems no matter the planet, or its culture, conflict can't be avoided... I wonder if that will ever change..."
"And [Double] seems to be making good use of this fact."

"Well, at least not everything is bad.
ARKS has broken free of Luther's influence, and looks like it's finally making some progress, moving forward."
"Though, putting Harkotan's and ARKS' situations aside, the main problem is still [Double]."

"[Loser] has already been absorbed.
[Apprentice] has been eaten since 10 years ago,
and [Elder] has been consumed as well."
"The power of all the Dark Falz till now have been devoured. This doesn't look like it's going to be easy to deal with."
"Also, you and Matoi have been straining yourselves, which is probably the most worrying thing..."
